A snow leopard walks down from the Tibetian mountains.  She walks 
down the snow covered slopes leaving huge tracks as she walks. She is 
called by something in her spark to come down from her home in the 
snow covered north and travel down to the hot lands below. It takes 
her 3 months to climb down the the mountain sides and to the valley 
below.  She was in no hurry for some reason.  But felt drawn to 
complete a mission set for her long before she was created.

She stopped at the base of the mountains and looked around. She 
looked southward and followed her nose and instincts.  She would stay 
on her course until she found her destination.  She walked along and 
would patiently keep walking day and night until she would arrive tot 
he place that called her.  THE ARK was were she was headed.

Name: SnowCat
Beast Mode : Snow Leopard
Bot Mode : Sleek, white body color 
Alliegnment: Maximal
Rank : none
Weapons: Claws, Teeth, Optics Lazars, Short sword.
